subtext.id5: This portfolio showcases personal projects I created to deepen my knowledge in tech, data, and app development, while having fun exploring new ideas.

bulletPoint1: üìä 7 Years of Expertise in Product Management for a B2B Tech Platform
bulletPoint2: üë©‚Äçüéì Self-Taught Fullstack Developer as a Hobby
bulletPoint4: ü§ù Available for Hire as a Product Owner/Product Manager

projects.intro: Browse through the projects to gain an understanding of my skills and approach to web development. Most of these projects are based on tutorials or challenges that allowed me to progress quickly and learn about several tech, but I am currently working on a massive project that allowed me to acquire a great experience in NextJS by building my own web app.

id7.title: Event Sharing App
id7.description: My most massive project. NB: The project is still in development, but you can check the progress here

id1.title: Share AI generated images
id1.description: A short and sweet project that uses the power of DallE AI to generate custom images and share them with the community.

id2.title: Threads Clone
id2.description: Find the design and main features of the famous app Threads.

id3.title: ThreeJS / DallE Demo
id3.description: Little project to learn ThreeJS while using DallE generated content

id4.title: AI Summarizer
id4.description: A simple page that summarizes the content of an URL using OpenAI.

id5.title: Back-end overhaul
id5.description: Migrating an existing NoSQL database to a relational model using TypeORM and PostgreSQL. API creation and documentation to be used by an existing front.

id6.title: My portfolio
id6.description: Just linking this here so you can check how I built this portfolio!

id8.title: Dev Challenges
id8.description: I tackled several little projects from DevChallenges.io to train myself to recreate front pages based on mock-up and specifications.

sectionDescription.title: From Product Vision to Code: Bridging Product Management and Web Development
sectionDescription.p1: With 7 years of enriching experience as a Product Manager in a B2B tech startup, I'm now seeking a new challenge as a Tech/Data Product Owner or Product Manager. My journey into full-stack web development has deepened my appreciation for the technical side of digital product creation, allowing me to better understand the intricate processes that drive innovation.
sectionDescription.p2: My background in product management has equipped me with a solid foundation in user experience (UX) principles, which I aim to leverage in crafting high-quality digital products. As I continue to expand my technical skills, including front-end frameworks like React and back-end technologies such as Node.js, I am eager to bring this combined expertise into a product management role.
sectionDescription.p3: This unique blend of product management experience and technical knowledge positions me to contribute to the development of impactful digital solutions that excel in both functionality and user experience.
sectionDescription.p4: Driven by a passion for technology, I am committed to mastering both the creative and technical aspects of product development. My goal is to bridge the gap between vision and execution, ensuring that innovative ideas are brought to life in a way that resonates with users.
sectionDescription.p5: This transition is not just a career shift but a strategic move to align my skills with my passion for tech and data-driven product management. I am excited to combine my product management expertise with my growing technical knowledge to lead the development of groundbreaking digital products and contribute to a forward-thinking company.
